MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk, affecting properties in Grahams Road and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:40pm to install a generator following an underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12pm on Friday, 23 October 2020.
